Uses of Class
com.github.wuic.engine.Engine

Packages that use Engine
com.github.wuic.engine This package contains the definition of an Engine. 
com.github.wuic.engine.impl.ehcache This package contains the engines which are based on the EhCache framework. 
com.github.wuic.engine.impl.embedded This package contains the engines which don't delegate its work to any library like YUI Compressor. 
com.github.wuic.engine.impl.yuicompressor This package contains the engines which are based on the YUI Compressor library. 
com.github.wuic.factory This package contains all the classes that transparently create the Engine implementations. 
com.github.wuic.factory.impl This package contains all the factory classes which provide Engine implementations. 
 

Uses of Engine in com.github.wuic.engine
 

Subclasses of Engine in com.github.wuic.engine
 class PackerEngine
           Abstract engine which could be extended by engines which uses a packing algorithm with an implementation provided by a DimensionPacker.

Subclasses of Engine in com.github.wuic.engine.impl.embedded
 class CGAbstractCompressorEngine
           This engine defines the base treatments to execute when compressing a set of files.
 class CGCompositeEngine
           Simple composition of engines.
 class CGCssInspectorEngine
           This engines parses CSS files thanks to a CGCssImportLineInspector and a CGCssBackgroundUrlLineInspector.
 class CGImageAggregatorEngine
           This engine is in charge to merge images into one final image.
 class CGImageCompressorEngine
           Engine that compress images.
 class CGSpriteAggregatorEngine
           This engine generates a sprite for different images.
 class CGSpriteCompressorEngine
           This engine compresses generated sprite for given files.
 class CGTextAggregatorEngine
           This engine can aggregate all the specified files in one path.
 class CGTextInspectorEngine
           Basic inspector engine for text resources processing text line per line.
